pyCoalesce package¶

@author: Dhruva Venkat @author: Scott Orr

The pyCoalesce package includes a main module, with functions for making requests to the Coalesce RESTful API, and two subpackages, one of which provides classes for representing Coalesce entities and linkages, and the other of which provides a handful of useful objects not directly related to the API.

API Requests Module¶

  • pyCoalesce.coalesce_request module
